text: Perros-Guirec is a commune. It is found in the region Bretagne in the Côtes-d'Armor department in the west of France. == Sister cities == Perros- Guirec is twinned with: * Barr, Bas-Rhin, France * Quintin, France * Teignmouth, England ==Related pages== * Ploumanac'h Category:Communes in Côtes-d'Armor
title: Perros-Guirec
